00010 
00011 class LinkedListItemBase
00012 {
00013 public:
00017     bool    linked() const      {return 0 != m_next || 0 != m_previous;}
00018 
00019 protected:
00020     LinkedListItemBase() : m_next(0), m_previous(0) {}
00021     virtual ~LinkedListItemBase();
00022 
00023     friend class LinkedListBase;
00024     LinkedListItemBase* m_next; 
00025     LinkedListItemBase* m_previous;
00026 
00027 private:
00028     LinkedListItemBase( const LinkedListItemBase& );
00029     LinkedListItemBase& operator=( const LinkedListItemBase& );
00030 };
00031 
00032 class LinkedListBase
00033 {
00034 public:
00035     LinkedListBase();
00036     virtual ~LinkedListBase();
00037     
00038     void    insert( LinkedListItemBase* item );
00039     void    remove( LinkedListItemBase* item );
00040 
00041     LinkedListItemBase*     last() const;
00042 
00043 protected:
00044     LinkedListItemBase*     m_first;
00045 
00046 private:
00047     LinkedListBase( const LinkedListBase& );
00048     LinkedListBase& operator=( const LinkedListBase& );
00049 };
00050 
00055 template <class T> class LinkedListItem :
00056     public LinkedListItemBase
00057 {
00058 public:
00062     T*      next() const            {return static_cast<T*>( m_next );}
00063 
00067     T*      previous() const        {return static_cast<T*>( m_previous );}
00068 };
00069 
00074 template <class T> class LinkedList :
00075     public LinkedListBase
00076 {
00077 public:
00081     void    insert( T* item )       {NS(LinkedListBase,insert)( item );}
00082 
00086     void    remove( T* item )       {NS(LinkedListBase,remove)( item );}
00087 
00091     T*      first() const           {return static_cast<T*>( m_first );}
00092     
00096     T*      last() const            {return static_cast<T*>( NS(LinkedListBase,last)() );}
00097 };
